LaunchQueue.summary: The LaunchQueue interface of the {{domxref("Launch Handler API", "Launch Handler API", "", "nocode")}} is available via the property. When a progressive web app (PWA) is launched with a launch_handler client_mode value of focus-existing, navigate-new, or navigate-existing, provides access to functionality that allows custom launch navigation handling to be implemented in the PWA. This functionality is controlled by the properties of the object passed into the callback function.

remarks.para:
-Launch Handler API: Control how your app is launched
-
-Musicr 2.0 demo app
